
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/LaiYun/p/18696931" title="发布于 2025-02-02 17:32">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">自定义Ollama安装路径</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　由于Ollama的exe安装软件双击安装的时候默认是在C盘，以及后续的模型数据下载也在C盘，导致会占用C盘空间，所以这里单独写了一个自定义安装Ollama安装目录的教程。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　Ollama官网地址：https://ollama.com/</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　这里有些朋友可能会遇到无法下载的问题，这里提供我下载好的软件包给大家</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　百度网盘链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1kFH3wUKLdorENBMV57O6CQ</span><br><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　提取码：kbls</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px"><span style="font-size: 18pt"><strong><span style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)">手动创建Ollama安装目录</span></strong></span>　　</span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　</span><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">首先在你想安装的路径下创建好一个文件，并把Ollama的安装包放在里面。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202154854167-1386375575.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">&nbsp;　　在文件路径上输入CMD回车后会自动打开命令窗口</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202154957800-1375188427.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1); font-size: 18pt"><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">输入命令符安装 　　</span></strong></span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　然后在CMD窗口输入：<span style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)"><strong>OllamaSetup.exe /DIR=E:\MySoftware\Ollama</strong></span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>语法：软件名称 /DIR=这里放你上面创建好的Ollama指定目录</strong></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202160035020-610240721.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　然后Ollama就会进入安装，点击Install后，可以看到Ollama的安装路径就变成了我们指定的目录了，这样大模型数据包也会默认下载在指定目录中。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202155814393-2077922203.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202160144178-819818066.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　　　　　　　　　　　<span style="font-size: 18pt"><strong><span style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)">到这里Ollama自定义目录安装就完结了。</span></strong></span></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　最后再讲个特例，就是有些小伙伴的Ollama已经安装在C盘了，但是又不想重新安装Ollama，只想把大模型资源包不要默认下载到C盘。</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 18pt; color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)"><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">手动创建大模型存储目录</span></strong></span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　首先先在你想要存储的盘符下创建好存储目录，比如我想存到E盘下面，我这里就创建了该目录：E:\MySoftware\Ollama</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202163826249-1003815276.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li><strong><span style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)"><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;"><span style="font-size: 24px">增加环境变量</span></span></span></strong></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　然后鼠标右键我的电脑--&gt;属性--&gt;高级系统设置--&gt;环境变量</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191217275-1649800636.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202501/1602588-20250130191316247-925018459.png" alt="" class="medium-zoom-image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">&nbsp;　　新建一个环境变量</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>OLLAMA_MODELS ：E:\MySoftware\Ollama\models</strong></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202163003693-483447617.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 18pt; color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)"><strong><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;">复制转移大模型存储目录</span></strong></span></li>
</ul>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　创建完环境变量后，把Ollama停止，然后进入C盘--&gt;用户--&gt;你自己的电脑名称--&gt;.ollama--&gt;复制整个models到刚刚上面新建的存储目录下。<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"><strong>复制完成后要删除C盘目录下的models文件夹。</strong></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202163333731-1458284717.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　复制到新创建的目录下</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1602588/202502/1602588-20250202164811646-550586913.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">　　重启Ollama，打开CMD输入<span style="color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)"><strong>Ollama list</strong></span>，查看大模型资源包是否能正常显示，显示正常则迁移完成，也可以直接和大模型进行提问，能回复说明也正常。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; font-size: 18px">&nbsp;</span></p>
</div>
